page.title: 13Steeple Aston
page.content: A mobile library service, provided by Oxfordshire County Council, comes once a fortnight. "Steeple Aston Life" is a monthly magazine delivered free to each house. There is a Post Office and three post boxes in Steeple Aston and there is a post box at Hopcrofts Holt. There are two pubs in Steeple Aston, the Red Lion and the White Lion. Hopcrofts Holt is a hotel, with a restaurant, on the A423 and many people use this as their local pub. Acommodation is provided by the hotel and is also available adjacent to the riding school complex in Steeple Aston.
